resources.string: Ready Reckoner for Feeding of Crossbred Dairy Cow, Milch Buffalo & Sheep

We are happy to introduce an android application for formulating ration for crossbred dairy cow, milch buffalo & Sheep.\nBalanced ration is formulated based on level of milk production i.e., 5, 7.5, 10, 12.5, 15 and 20 lit/day for a cow weighing 400 kg at different levels of availability of green fodder per day.\nSimilarly for milch buffalo balanced ration is formulated based on level of milk production i.e., 3, 6, 9 and 12 lit/day and weighing 450 kg at different levels of availability of green fodder per day (High, moderate and low).
